titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 808) to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the offset from surviving spouse annuities under the military Survivor Benefit Plan for amounts paid by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs as dependency and indemnity compensation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Edwards. Petition No: 109-3.

bill.summary: 5/11/2005--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 808) to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the offset from surviving spouse annuities under the military Survivor Benefit Plan for amounts paid by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs as dependency and indemnity compensation.
